name: Lantern Light
text: Your thrown weapons become pure light, overcoming enemy defenses.
prerequisites: Lantern Style, Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, good or lawful alignment, caster level 7th or monk level 7th.
benefit: When you make a single ranged attack with a thrown weapon, that weapon temporarily transforms into pure holy light, overcoming the targetâ€™s damage reduction, if any.
